docs.snippet: Anzio is engraved in history books as the main landing site of forces that went on to liberate Rome. Now nearby Nettuno is seeking to stake its claim....
docs.lead_paragraph: Anzio is engraved in history books as the main landing site of forces that went on to liberate Rome. Now nearby Nettuno is seeking to stake its claim.
docs.abstract: Italian seaside towns of Nettuno and Anzio are locked in dispute over which has right to commemorate Jan 22, 1944, landing of Allied forces who liberated Rome in World War II; towns, both of whom received troops, have been sharing honor for decades, but Nettuno has stepped up to stake claim.

headline.main: Wartime Claim to Fame Divides 2 Italian Towns
headline.print_headline: Wartime Claim to Fame Divides 2 Italian Towns
